prompts.title: Viral Instagram Reel Hook
prompts.description: Create scroll-stopping hooks that make viewers watch till the end
prompts.promptText:
Create a 30-second Instagram Reel script about [TOPIC] with:
- Hook in first 2 seconds that creates curiosity
- 3 quick tips or facts
- Strong CTA at the end
- Text overlay suggestions for each scene
completeSteps: Copy the prompt by clicking the copy button
Open ChatGPT or your preferred AI tool and paste the prompt
Fill in [TOPIC] with your specific topic
Review the generated script and make any adjustments
Open your video editing app (CapCut, InShot, etc.)
Record or add clips according to the script
Add text overlays as suggested in the script
Export the video and upload to Instagram Reels

prompts.title: Instagram Story Engagement
prompts.description: Interactive story prompts that boost engagement and replies
prompts.promptText:
Generate 5 engaging Instagram Story ideas for [YOUR NICHE] including:
- Poll questions
- This or That choices
- Question stickers
- Quiz elements
Make them conversational and authentic.
completeSteps: Copy the prompt to your clipboard
Open ChatGPT and paste the prompt
Replace [YOUR NICHE] with your specific niche or industry
Review the 5 story ideas generated
Open Canva or Instagram's story editor
Design your story with the suggested interactive elements
Add polls, question stickers, or quiz elements
Post to your Instagram Story

prompts.title: Emotional Instagram Caption
prompts.description: Write captions that connect deeply and drive comments
prompts.promptText:
Write an Instagram caption for [POST TOPIC] that:
- Opens with a personal story or question
- Shares a valuable lesson or insight
- Ends with a question to spark conversation
- Includes 3-5 relevant hashtags
Tone: [authentic/professional/playful]
completeSteps: Copy the prompt by clicking the button
Open ChatGPT or similar AI tool
Fill in [POST TOPIC] with your specific post subject
Choose your preferred tone (authentic/professional/playful)
Review and personalize the generated caption
Add emojis if needed
Copy the final caption
Paste into Instagram and post with your photo or video

prompts.title: YouTube Video Script
prompts.description: Complete video script with timestamps and hooks
prompts.promptText:
Create a YouTube video script for [TOPIC] (10-15 min) with:
- Attention-grabbing first 30 seconds
- Clear structure with timestamps
- B-roll suggestions
- Engagement prompts (like, subscribe)
- Strong outro with CTA
completeSteps: Copy the prompt to clipboard
Open ChatGPT and paste the prompt
Replace [TOPIC] with your video topic
Review the generated script structure
Adjust timestamps based on your content length
Print or save the script for reference
Set up your filming equipment
Record your video following the script
Use B-roll suggestions during editing

prompts.title: Click-Worthy Thumbnail Ideas
prompts.description: Design concepts that boost CTR by 300%
prompts.promptText:
Generate 5 YouTube thumbnail concepts for [VIDEO TOPIC] with:
- Bold text (3-5 words max)
- Color psychology suggestions
- Facial expression recommendations
- Contrasting elements
- A/B test variations
completeSteps: Copy the prompt by clicking the button
Open ChatGPT and paste the prompt
Fill in [VIDEO TOPIC] with your video subject
Review the 5 thumbnail concepts generated
Open Canva and create a new YouTube thumbnail (1280x720px)
Implement the design suggestions (colors, text, expressions)
Export thumbnail in high quality
Upload to YouTube as your video thumbnail
Test different variations to see which performs better

prompts.title: LinkedIn Thought Leader Post
prompts.promptText:
Write a LinkedIn post about [PROFESSIONAL TOPIC] that:
- Starts with a bold statement or statistic
- Shares personal experience or case study
- Provides 3-5 actionable takeaways
- Ends with a discussion question
- Professional yet conversational tone
Length: 150-200 words
completeSteps: Copy the prompt to your clipboard
Open ChatGPT and paste the prompt
Replace [PROFESSIONAL TOPIC] with your topic
Review the generated post
Personalize with your own experience or data
Ensure it's within 150-200 words
Add line breaks for readability
Post to LinkedIn and engage with comments

prompts.title: LinkedIn Carousel Post
prompts.description: Educational slide decks that go viral
prompts.promptText:
Create a 10-slide LinkedIn carousel about [TOPIC]:
- Slide 1: Attention-grabbing title
- Slides 2-8: One key point per slide
- Slide 9: Summary/Conclusion
- Slide 10: CTA (follow, comment)
Include headline and 2-3 bullet points per slide.
completeSteps: Copy the prompt by clicking the button
Open ChatGPT and paste the prompt
Fill in [TOPIC] with your subject matter
Review the 10-slide content structure
Open Canva and search for LinkedIn carousel templates
Create slides with the generated content
Use consistent branding and design
Export as PDF or individual images
Upload to LinkedIn as a document post
Add an engaging caption to drive clicks

prompts.title: Midjourney Photorealistic Portrait
prompts.description: Create stunning realistic portraits with perfect lighting
prompts.promptText: /imagine prompt: Professional portrait of [SUBJECT DESCRIPTION], 85mm lens, f/1.4 aperture, natural window lighting, soft shadows, sharp focus on eyes, bokeh background, photorealistic, highly detailed skin texture, 8K resolution --ar 2:3 --style raw --v 6.0
completeSteps: Copy the Midjourney prompt
Open Discord and go to Midjourney server
Paste the prompt in any generation channel
Replace [SUBJECT DESCRIPTION] with your desired subject
Wait for Midjourney to generate 4 variations
Click 'U1', 'U2', 'U3', or 'U4' to upscale your favorite
Right-click the upscaled image and save
Use the image for your project

prompts.title: DALL-E 3 Product Photography
prompts.description: Generate professional product shots without a studio
prompts.promptText: Create a professional product photography shot of [PRODUCT] on a [BACKGROUND COLOR] background, studio lighting with soft shadows, slight reflection underneath, minimal modern aesthetic, product centered, shot from slight high angle, commercial photography style, 8K, hyperrealistic
completeSteps: Copy the prompt to your clipboard
Go to ChatGPT with DALL-E 3 access or bing.com/create
Paste the prompt
Replace [PRODUCT] and [BACKGROUND COLOR] with your specifics
Wait for DALL-E to generate the image
If needed, request refinements or variations
Download the final image in high resolution
Use for your product marketing materials

prompts.title: Cold Email Outreach
prompts.promptText:
Write a cold email to [TARGET AUDIENCE] for [PRODUCT/SERVICE]:
- Subject line (6-8 words)
- Personalized opening
- Value proposition in 2 sentences
- Social proof or case study
- Clear CTA
- Email signature
Tone: Professional yet friendly
Length: Under 150 words
completeSteps: Copy the email prompt
Open ChatGPT and paste it
Fill in [TARGET AUDIENCE] and [PRODUCT/SERVICE]
Review the generated email
Add specific personalization about the recipient
Include real social proof or case studies
Proofread for any errors
Send via your email platform
Follow up if no response in 3-5 days

prompts.title: SEO Blog Post Outline
prompts.promptText:
Create an SEO-optimized blog post outline for keyword: [KEYWORD]
- Target word count: 2000+ words
- Include H2 and H3 headings
- Meta description (155 characters)
- FAQ section (5 questions)
- Internal linking suggestions
- Featured snippet opportunity
Analyze top 3 ranking pages and suggest improvements.
completeSteps: Copy the SEO prompt
Open ChatGPT and paste it
Replace [KEYWORD] with your target keyword
Review the outline structure
Research the top 3 ranking pages for the keyword
Add additional insights from your research
Use the outline to write your full blog post
Optimize meta description and headings
Add internal links to relevant content
Publish and monitor rankings

prompts.title: ATS-Optimized Resume
prompts.description: Beat applicant tracking systems and land interviews
prompts.promptText:
Transform my job experience into an ATS-optimized resume bullet point:
Job: [POSITION]
Company: [COMPANY]
What I did: [DESCRIPTION]

Rewrite using:
- Action verbs
- Quantifiable metrics
- Industry keywords
- Achievement-focused
Provide 3 variations.
completeSteps: Copy the resume optimization prompt
Open ChatGPT and paste it
Fill in your job position, company, and description
Review all 3 variations provided
Choose the one that best fits your experience
Add it to your resume document
Ensure formatting is consistent
Save as PDF for ATS compatibility
Apply to job postings

prompts.title: Cover Letter Generator
prompts.description: Personalized cover letters that stand out
prompts.promptText:
Write a compelling cover letter for:
Position: [JOB TITLE]
Company: [COMPANY NAME]
My background: [BRIEF SUMMARY]
Why I'm interested: [REASON]

Include:
- Personalized opening
- 2-3 relevant achievements
- Company research insights
- Enthusiasm for role
- Strong closing
Length: 250-300 words
completeSteps: Copy the cover letter prompt
Open ChatGPT and paste it
Fill in job title, company name, and your background
Research the company before generating
Review the generated cover letter
Add personal touches and specific examples
Proofread carefully
Save as PDF with proper naming (FirstName_LastName_CoverLetter.pdf)
Submit with your job application

prompts.title: Professional Bio Generator
prompts.promptText:
Create a professional bio for [PLATFORM] with:
Your role: [TITLE]
Expertise: [SKILLS]
Achievements: [NOTABLE WINS]
Personality trait: [CHARACTERISTIC]

Deliver 3 versions:
- Short (50 words) - Twitter/Instagram
- Medium (100 words) - LinkedIn
- Long (200 words) - Website/Speaker bio

Tone: [Professional/Casual/Creative]
completeSteps: Copy the bio generation prompt
Open ChatGPT and paste it
Fill in your role, expertise, and achievements
Choose your preferred tone
Review all 3 versions (short, medium, long)
Edit to match your voice and personality
Use the short version for Twitter/Instagram
Use the medium version for LinkedIn
Use the long version for your website or speaker page

prompts.title: TikTok Viral Script
prompts.description: Create videos that hit the For You Page
prompts.promptText:
Generate a TikTok script for [TOPIC] (15-60 sec):
- Hook: First 1 second to stop scrolling
- Problem/Curiosity gap
- Quick tips or entertainment
- Call to action
- On-screen text suggestions
- Trending audio recommendation
- Hashtag strategy (3-5 tags)
completeSteps: Copy the TikTok script prompt
Open ChatGPT and paste it
Replace [TOPIC] with your video idea
Review the script with hook, content, and CTA
Choose a trending audio from TikTok
Film your video following the script
Edit in TikTok or CapCut
Add on-screen text as suggested
Use recommended hashtags
Post and engage with comments

prompts.title: Viral Twitter Thread
prompts.description: Threads that get thousands of retweets
prompts.promptText:
Create a Twitter thread about [TOPIC] with:
- Attention-grabbing first tweet
- 7-10 tweets total
- Each tweet standalone valuable
- Data, stories, or insights
- Thread unroller friendly
- Strong CTA at end
- Relevant hashtags

Style: Educational storytelling
completeSteps: Copy the Twitter thread prompt
Open ChatGPT and paste it
Fill in [TOPIC] with your thread subject
Review the 7-10 tweets generated
Edit each tweet to match your voice
Ensure each tweet is under 280 characters
Use a tool like Typefully or Twitter directly
Schedule or post the thread
Pin the first tweet for visibility
Engage with replies to boost reach
